sora_prompt: Create a stunning 10-second zodiac horoscope video. Scene: a majestic ram standing on a volcanic mountain peak at sunrise, flames dancing around its golden horns. In the sky above, a large glowing the Aries zodiac glyph (two curved horns symbol) shines as a celestial emblem. Color palette: crimson red and gold. Mood: powerful, energetic, bold. Camera: slow dramatic zoom with gentle orbit.
